metadata.dc:title: [African American Civil War soldier in Union uniform.]
metadata.dc:subject: African Americans
Civil War, 1861-1865
History
Soldiers, Black
United States
metadata.dcterms:abstract: Half length portrait of a man seated with one arm resting on a table. Image scanned as part of Cased Photographs Project in 2000 with file name brk00041493_8a.tif
metadata.dc:description: Image shows buttons and uniform is hand-colored; Tintype has no container; Photographer unknown; Title supplied by cataloger.
metadata.dcterms:bibliographicCitation: Preferred citation: African American Civil War soldier in Union uniform, BANC PIC 1975.049:001--CASE, The Bancroft Library, University of California, Berkeley.
metadata.dc:publisher: The Bancroft Library, University of California, Berkeley, CA 94720-6000
metadata.dcterms:extent: 1 photograph : tintype ; sixth plate, visible image 7.8 x 6 cm.
